subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After making several strides in the right direction — like showing that they had a formidable bench and that Vince Carter was a superstar — the Nets belly-flopped in their first home game in a week and a half.
snippet: After making several strides in the right direction — like showing that they had a formidable bench and that Vince Carter was a superstar — the Nets belly-flopped in their first home game in a week and a half.
